item.title: ')' Expected ';' Expected -- Java error
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Just a suggestion, if not I can’t help…

Try changing:

deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);

to:

deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, (playerItemsN[slot]));

Idk, worth a try. Apologies if not.

item.title: ')' Expected ';' Expected -- Java error
item.dc:creator: @Laydee_Emo Laydee Emo
item.description:
@Laydee_Emo wrote:

Hi I’m having trouble… I keep getting this error.

Here’s some of the code I’m trying to fix:

if(droppedItem == 1560) { sM("You drop your Kitten"); server.npcHandler.newPetNPC(766, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(766), false, playerId); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); }

Here’s the error it’s reading out:

client.java:16669: ')' expected (droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);

I’ve tried adding, removing braces, not sure what else to do and I don’t know why it’s giving me that error.

Thanks for any help.
